articles.title: Duterte reimposes coronavirus lockdown as he criticises doctors - Al Jazeera English
Philippines logs record-high 6,352 new COVID-19 cases, total up to 112,593 - GMA News
articles.description: The Philippines once again broke its own record for the highest number of new coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) cases in a single day after the Department of Health (DOH) announced 6,352 new infections on Tuesday, bringing the total to 112,593.
